#summary range - expands a list of numbers & number ranges into individual values.

= Usage =

`range <options> <range_string>`

<range_string> may be a mixture of comma-separated numbers and ranges (no spaces).

`example: range 1,2,6-10`

= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||*Argument*||*Description*||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
